Title: Erratum to “Sustainable planning of the energy-water-food nexus using decision making tools” [Energy Policy 113 (2018) 584–607] (S0301421517307838) (10.1016/j.enpol.2017.11.037))
Abstract: © 2018 The Author(s)The publisher regrets that the printed version of this article contained duplicated figures due to a typesetting issue that has now been resolved. These duplicate figures have now been removed on the online version, causing a decrease in the amount of typeset pages. Blank pages have been added to the online PDF to maintain the same pagination. The publisher would like to apologise for any inconvenience caused.
